record.id: field.name="end.operating" and file.name="info" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: end.operating
record.file.name: info

brief.brief: The time the duty day ends for the day of the week given by the label.
Each day of the week must have a corresponding beginning of operating hours.
If both fields are blank, the day referenced is a non-work day.
When entered, it must be in the format hh:mm:ss and the beginning of operating hours must be earlier for that day.
You do not have to indicate the seconds (:ss), Service Manager can fill them in.

detail.detail: This is a date/time (type 3) field. It is the second field of a structure (type 9) within an array (type 8), which itself is the third field of a structure (type 9) within an array (type 8).
